title: Net Interest-Bearing Federal Debt for United States
notes:
Series Is Presented Here As Four Variables--(1)--Original Data, 1917-1939 (2)--Original Data, 1917-1939 (3)--Original Data, 1939-1968 (4)--Original Data, 1939-1949. From October 1939-September 1943, The Published Figures Have Been Adjusted To Exclude U.S. Security Holdings In The Exchange Stabilization Fund. Beginning In October 1943, The Source Includes Such Holdings With Those Of All Other U.S. Government Agencies. Source: U.S. Treasury Department, Bulletin Of The Treasury Department

This NBER data series m15007d appears on the NBER website in Chapter 15 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter15.html.

NBER Indicator: m15007d
